text: (( what would you feel about, after a few weeks or so of oso being their pet, one of the other matsus gets kidnapped and shares his brother's enslavement? and if you're ok with it, they could be forced to do things with each other or else get severely punished
Hey! Momentarily back and I'm doing better. I'm completely down for that idea and I'd love to see the drawing when it's done

There's no where to go. He can't run. He can't hide. Fighting back would only get him punished or put him in an even worse situation. Though there isn't much to looking on the bright side either in Oso's opinion. 

He resists momentarily, unable to squirm his head away from the bottle pressed to his lips with the hand firmly against the back of his head. Eventually Oso concedes defeat, figuring it would just be easier to drink. 

Grimacing and nearly gagging at the taste, his throat pulses with every swallow as he chugs down his own seed. The thick fluid trickles down his throat and coats his tongue, and Oso whines as he finishes off the container over the course of several minutes.

Shin doesn't let up for a second as he forces Oso to drink his own cum, reveling in his distressed noises. When he's finished off the bottle, he pulls it back, looking down into the slave's eyes.

"You seem to have gotten at least a little used to crawling in that position..." He says, giving his nipple another rough pinch. "But you'll have to go faster if you want to succeed at those races in a few days."

Daichi grabs onto the leash, tugging it as he walks towards the door.

"We'll get you set up for a training program we came up with," Daichi explains, yanking on the leash as he walks into the hallway. "We have a treadmill for you to walk on to increase your speed, and a 'special diet' for you to be on.

"We even got you a cage for you to sleep in. Aren't we great masters, Oso-kun?"

Shin grabs onto the mask and gag, following Daichi out the door.

Having his chest, ass, and cock bared is easily going to be the peak of his torment in Oso's opinion. It's better without the mask because at least then he's able to see where things are headed - though it doesn't lessen the sting of pinch one bit. 

Sore cock throbbing between his legs, the smaller man crawls with the same humiliating wiggling along the floor that he's found easiest to make. It's a small victory that he's just barely fast enough to avoid being chocked. 

Hearing the plan laid out for him, Oso lapses into a terrified silence, eyes firmly rooted to putting one elbow in front of the other.

The three reach Osomatsu's new room, for the most part looking the same as the other room except for the treadmill laid out and the large cage with a tube of semen attached to the side.

"Here's where you'll be staying." Daichi walks towards the treadmill, tugging Oso along before Shin picks him up and places him on it. "You'll be expected to stay in good shape, so we'll put you on the treadmill for at least 30 minutes a day. If you can't keep up, you'll be punished accordingly. Any comments before Shin puts the gag back in?"

Shin holds the gag up to Oso's lips, wondering if he'll keep quiet or lash out.
